name: Asphalt 8: Airborne (Mac!)
description:
Asphalt 8: Airborne is a 2013 racing video game, developed by Gameloft Barcelona and published by Gameloft as part of the Asphalt series. The game's successor Asphalt 9: Legends was announced on February 26, 2018. The game has about 470 million players, according to the game description in the App Store.

"The Bottom Line. Asphalt 8: Airborne is probably the best arcade racing game I've seen yet, with tons of light-hearted racing fun, but you'll have to fight the urge to spend your money." Said an article from https://www.cnet.com.

And here's a little secret! Asphalt 10 is in the making and is set to be released in Summer 2023 as a worldwide release and March 2023 as a soft launch.
